title: Timing, Jumps, and Cues
description: In this video, I cover how to working with "timing" and audio in the p5.js sound library.  I look at how to add cues and jump to different points of time in a sound file in the browser

timestamps.title: Write a function to jumpt to a point in a song
Use currentTime() to trigger a change in background color
Use addCue() to call a function at a certain point in song
